article_title: Do Recruiters Tell About The Castration Risk?
article_text: Ted Rall is a nationally syndicated editorial cartoonist, writer and occasional war correspondent best known for his coverage of Afghanistan, Pakistan and Central Asia. A Pulitzer finalist and twice the winner of the RFK Journalism Award, Ted is the author of 17 books including "Revenge of the Latchkey Kids," about Gen Xers, "To Afghanistan and Back," the noted comix journalism work, and, most recently, "Snowden" (about the NSA whistleblower. His comix biography of Bernie Sanders appears January 19, 2016.

article_metadata.description: According to the Pentagon, 1,367 soldiers lost all or part of their genitals in the wars in Afghanistan and Iraq from 2001 to 2013. Ted Rall cartoon.

og.description: According to the Pentagon, 1,367 soldiers lost all or part of their genitals in the wars in Afghanistan and Iraq from 2001 to 2013. Ted Rall cartoon.
og.title: Ted Rall: Do Recruiters Tell Would-Be Soldiers About The Castration Risk?

article_summary:
Ted Rall is a nationally syndicated editorial cartoonist, writer and occasional war correspondent best known for his coverage of Afghanistan, Pakistan and Central Asia.
His comix biography of Bernie Sanders appears January 19, 2016.
A Pulitzer finalist and twice the winner of the RFK Journalism Award, Ted is the author of 17 books including "Revenge of the Latchkey Kids," about Gen Xers, "To Afghanistan and Back," the noted comix journalism work, and, most recently, "Snowden" (about the NSA whistleblower.
